## Touch.splitEventByTouches() function

Split an event into an array of events, one per changed touch or mouse point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function splitEventByTouches(e: Event): Array<Event | PseudoEvent>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event | A mouse event or a touch event with one or more changed touches. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;Event \| PseudoEvent&gt;

An array of events or pseudo events. Each pseudo-touch event will have exactly one changed touch and there will be no real touch events.
